review: Nice streamer. Wish it had more processing power and the ability to connect headphones via Bluetooth or at least with wires to the remote controls for private listening.
author: Shlomi

review: Warning!  Highly addicting!  Seriously this is a very cool tool. It will take me a while to fully explore it! You need this.
author: Barb King

review: Love it! I also purchased the voice remote control. I am happy I purchased both.
author: maynard320

review: I love the Fire Stick. Between the channels that came loaded, and those I loaded myself, there are plenty of channels available.Great product!
author: Robert Warner "abdominal showman"

review: Love it but not enough free movies and fun DvD  What's up with that Amazon?
author: sonia sg7777

review: I use this more than my Roku streaming stick!  The remote is better and so is the home screen.  I got a good deal when it first came out, but wish I had bought more as gifts!  Everyone needs one.
author: Mallory Traylor
